original_text: Then Simon Peter came along behind him and went straight into the tomb. He saw the strips of linen lying there,
korean_text: 시몬 베드로는 따라와서 무덤에 들어가 보니 세마포가 놓였고

sentences.original_text: Then Simon Peter came along behind him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 시몬 베드로가 그의 뒤를 따라왔고

sentences.original_text: and went straight into the tomb
He saw the strips of linen
